levels.description:
Attack Interval <@ba.vdown>increases</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, Attack Range extends by <@ba.vup>+{ability_range_forward_extend}</> and becomes a long-range AoE attack, attacks now push enemies away <@ba.vup>very slightly</>
<@ba.rem>Unlimited duration</>
